name: Party, Darling?
description:
"Party, Darling?" is a narrative adventure game developed with S-Tengine 2, the SweetHeart Squad's custom C++ and OpenGL-based open source engine.

The game revolves around a murder mystery, where the player must explore the alternate realities of a bizarre mansion in search of its mysterious owner, Omar Clean. Help or hinder the quirky characters you meet as you explore a potentially infinite number of procedurally generated mansions.
